full_sentence: When you don't have to work with dimwits, suddenly going to the office doesn't seem so awful...

the fact is there are however different entrances for Muslims and non Muslims. Non Muslims are allowed in Mecca, just not around the area of the Ka'aba. Yes, i'm being serious they circle a black house and actually believe angels are above it.

yes bro, let it fucking burn. I am fed up with this society. Thank god somebody is on my side. I have to deal on a daily basis with dumb ass blue pilled idiots who help sustain this hell hole of a society. Yeah, hard working men are shitted on and whores on social media are praised in this society. Before I entered the manosphere I had the idea of just staying put and working for society, now I plan to live off grid. Infact, I suggest all MGTOWs withdraw from society, there is enough of us to make a difference. You also never know who is on what side at this point. We need an army to help bring society and women down.
